name: Xtreme Party host
description:
2 - Player coop!
Home is where you and your friends feel happy and comfortable. That's why you and your flatmates throw an epic party for everyone who likes partying! Your reasponsibility as the host is to keep your guests as satisfied as possible, while making sure that the party doesn't and in sudden chaos and utter destruction. Feed them pizza, keep the beer flowing and the dancefloor crowded. But don't let drunk guests ruin your interiors or annoy the neighbours too much, they might call the police!

Controls: Move around and press A to interact. No more Buttons needed!

Tasks: 

  • order Pizza
  • change the music
  • distribute some beer out of the fridge
  • keep everything clean
  • make everyone happy!
